title: Border, 1800–30
description:
Four bands of a border design printed across the width. Each band consists of a wide central strip containing dragonflies framed by octagonal, beaded shapes with attached sprays of foliage alternating with lozenges pierced by two arrows. Above this strip is a band of simple floral motifs (quatrefoil) alternating with diamonds, all these punctuated by a center dot. Below the wide central strip are two narrow stripes. Printed in blue, mauve, green and white on a black ground.

H# 515

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1800–30.
1800–30. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-2-a,b.
